page.title: 16Occupations and Industries
page.content: In the west near Staunton, British Gypsum make plaster board. Many families who farm the area have done so for generations. Nowadays they use machines and have few workers,with extra help for potato picking. The hotel and public houses all provide meals which gives employment to local people. Other jobs are connected with shops, transport, the building trade, postal and delivery services. Several people work from their homes such as solicitors, designers and consultants. The majority of people travel to work with a variety of occupations. Some are linked with science and technology. Quite a number of retired people live in the area, attracted by the rural setting, amenities and easy access to nearby towns.The number of young children is increasing.
